dict.string: Onsen Planner uses your location to show weather forecasts alongside your calendar events, helping you plan your week better.
Onsen Planner can show weather forecasts for your calendar days to help you plan activities.
Onsen Planner needs access to your contacts to import and sync contact information for easy management within the app.
Onsen Planner uses the camera to scan QR codes for quickly importing contact information.
Onsen Planner uses photos for contact profile pictures, letting you personalize your contacts with custom images.
Onsen Planner shows your calendar events alongside the weekly view, helping you see your schedule at a glance.
